Green Sandals
kDesc
These green sandals are as at home with your favourite summer dress as they are with your swimming costume. [#Legal]
Ces sandales vertes s'accorderont autant avec votre robe d'été préférée qu'avec votre maillot de bain. [#Legal]
Diese grünen Sandalen passen genauso gut zu Ihrem Lieblingssommerkleid wie zu Ihrem Badeanzug. [#Legal]
Questi sandali verdi stanno a pennello tanto con il tuo vestito estivo preferito quanto con il costume da bagno. [#Legal]
Estas sandalias verdes quedan tan bien con tu vestido de verano favorito como con tu bañador. [#Legal]
ちょっとそこまで！スリッパは生活必需品。 [#Legal]
간편하고 멋진 그린 샌들은 어떠한 여름 옷이나 수영복과도 환상의 조합을 이룹니다.[#Legal]
These green sandals are as at home with your favourite summer dress as they are with your swimming costume. [#Legal]
綠色涼鞋，可搭配您最愛的夏裝或游泳裝扮。[#Legal]
綠色涼鞋，可搭配您最愛的夏裝或游泳裝扮。[#Legal]
These green sandals are as at home with your favourite summer dress as they are with your swimming costume. [#Legal]
